## RemotePlaywright.firefox property

Reference to an object implementing the [BrowserType](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browsertype) interface from playwright allowing to control firefox.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
firefox: BrowserType<FirefoxBrowser>;
```
